title: By Adverse Winds. [A novel.]
author: Smeaton, William Henry Oliphant.
snippet: The carriage drove along Grange Loan, then into theCausewayside, finaUy through Powburn, thus taking what iscaUed " the old road" to Liberton. At the foot of the hdlcrowned by the old parish church with its quadrilateralsteeple, stands the httle hamlet called Liberton Dams—sonamed from the storage tanks of the Edinburgh WaterCompany, some eighty or a hundred years ago, being locatedthere.
